full_summary:
==================================

### Tender Notice: Haworth Panel System Refurbishing

#### Notification Type: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada (OSFI) intends to award a contract for office furniture refurbishment services to Advanced Business Interiors Inc. (ABI) Pursuant to the requirements set out in this Notice, other suppliers may submit a statement of capabilities to demonstrate their ability to meet the specified requirements.

#### Requirement Definition

OSFI requires refurbishing services for its office furniture. This Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) serves as a notification of OSFI's intention to award a contract for these services to ABI.

#### Criteria for Evaluation

Any interested supplier must demonstrate, through a statement of capabilities, that their refurbishing services and products meet the following requirements:

* Ability to refurbish Haworth interconnected panel systems
* Ability to resell new product components from Haworth
* Ability to transport products from their site to OSFI and back within the National Capital Region

#### Applicable Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Trade Agreement (CTA)
* Revised World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

#### Contract Details

* Contract period: Initial period from contract award date to March 31, 2026, with the option to extend the contract up to two (2) additional 1-year periods.
* Estimated contract value: $745,800.00 (including HST)

#### Submission Instructions

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to meet the specified requirements may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the Contracting Authority identified in this Notice on or before the closing date and time of November 25, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. (EST).

#### Contact Information

Inquiries and statements of capabilities should be directed to:

Andrew Bryant
Senior Contracting Officer
contracting-approvisionnement@osfi-bsif.gc.ca
255 Albert St., 12th floor
